00115 template <typename PositionT, typename PointAttributeT>
00116 class PointAttributeList
00117 {
00118 public:
00119     typedef PositionT                                                   value_type;
00120     typedef PositionT                                                   position_type;
00121     typedef PointAttributeT                                             PointAttributeType;
00122     typedef typename PointAttributeType::Ptr                            PointAttributePtr;
00123     typedef typename PointAttributeType::template Accessor<PositionT>   PositionAccessor;
00124     typedef typename PositionAccessor::Ptr                              PositionAccessorPtr;
00125     typedef boost::shared_ptr<PointAttributeList>                       Ptr;
00126     typedef typename std::vector<PointAttributePtr>::const_iterator     const_iterator;
00127     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor                                    Descriptor;
00128 
00129     explicit PointAttributeList(PointAttributePtr positionAttribute)
00130         : mPositionAttribute(positionAttribute)
00131         , mPositionAccessor(mPositionAttribute->template getAccessor<PositionT>())
00132         , mSize(mPositionAttribute->size())
00133     {
00134         // implicitly insert position into attribute list
00135 
00136         mAttributes.push_back(positionAttribute);
00137     }
00138 
00139     Index64 attributes() const { return mAttributes.size(); }
00140 
00141     PointAttributePtr attribute(const unsigned index) const { return mAttributes[index]; }
00142 
00143     Index64 size() const { return mSize; }
00144 
00145     void getPos(Index64 n, PositionT& xyz) const {
00146         mPositionAccessor->getValue(n, xyz);
00147     }
00148 
00149     void addAttribute(PointAttributePtr attribute)
00150     {
00151         for (const_iterator it = cbegin(), itEnd = cend(); it != itEnd; ++it)
00152         {
00153             if (attribute->name() == (*it)->name()) {
00154                 throw std::runtime_error("Duplicate attribute: " + attribute->name());
00155             }
00156         }
00157 
00158         mAttributes.push_back(attribute);
00159 
00160         // sort the elements after every insertion
00161 
00162         std::sort(mAttributes.begin(), mAttributes.end());
00163     }
00164 
00165     const_iterator cbegin() const { return mAttributes.begin(); }
00166     const_iterator cend() const { return mAttributes.end(); }
00167 
00168     Descriptor::Ptr attributeDescriptor() const {
00169         Descriptor::Ptr descriptor;
00170 
00171         std::vector<Descriptor::NameAndType> vec;
00172 
00173         for (const_iterator it = cbegin(), it_end = cend(); it != it_end; ++it) {
00174             vec.push_back(Descriptor::NameAndType((*it)->name(), (*it)->type()));
00175         }
00176 
00177         return Descriptor::create(vec);
00178     }
00179 
00180 private:
00181     PointAttributePtr mPositionAttribute;
00182     PositionAccessorPtr mPositionAccessor;
00183     Index64 mSize;
00184 
00185     std::vector<PointAttributePtr> mAttributes;
00186 }; // class PointAttributeList

00192 template<typename PointDataTreeType, typename PointIndexTreeType, typename PointArray>
00193 struct InitialiseAttributesOp {
00194 
00195     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<PointDataTreeType> LeafManagerT;
00196     typedef typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange LeafRangeT;
00197 
00198     typedef typename PointIndexTreeType::LeafNodeType PointIndexLeafNode;
00199     typedef typename PointIndexLeafNode::IndexArray IndexArray;
00200 
00201     InitialiseAttributesOp( PointDataTreeType& tree,
00202                             const PointIndexTreeType& pointIndexTree,
00203                             const PointArray& points,
00204                             const AttributeSet::Descriptor::Ptr& attributeDescriptor)
00205         : mTree(tree)
00206         , mPointIndexTree(pointIndexTree)
00207         , mPoints(&points)
00208         , mAttributeDescriptor(attributeDescriptor) { }
00209 
00210     void operator()(const typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange& range) const {
00211         for (typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange::Iterator leaf=range.begin(); leaf; ++leaf) {
00212 
00213             // obtain the PointIndexLeafNode (using the origin of the current leaf)
00214 
00215             const PointIndexLeafNode* pointIndexLeaf = mPointIndexTree.probeConstLeaf(leaf->origin());
00216 
00217             if (!pointIndexLeaf)    continue;
00218 
00219             // initialise the attribute storage
00220 
00221             pointIndexLeaf->indices();
00222 
00223             const IndexArray& indices = pointIndexLeaf->indices();
00224 
00225             Index64 pointCount = indices.size();
00226 
00227             leaf->initializeAttributes(mAttributeDescriptor, pointCount);
00228         }
00229     }
00230 
00232 
00233     const PointDataTreeType&                mTree;
00234     const PointIndexTreeType&               mPointIndexTree;
00235     PointArray      const * const           mPoints;
00236     const AttributeSet::Descriptor::Ptr&    mAttributeDescriptor;
00237 };
00238 
00239 template<   typename PointDataTreeType,
00240             typename PointIndexTreeType,
00241             typename HoudiniAttributeType,
00242             typename AccessorType>
00243 struct PopulateAttributeOp {
00244 
00245     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<PointDataTreeType>       LeafManagerT;
00246     typedef typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange                    LeafRangeT;
00247     typedef typename PointDataTreeType::LeafNodeType            PointDataLeafNode;
00248 
00249     typedef typename PointIndexTreeType::LeafNodeType           PointIndexLeafNode;
00250     typedef typename PointIndexLeafNode::IndexArray             IndexArray;
00251 
00252     PopulateAttributeOp(const PointIndexTreeType& pointIndexTree,
00253                         const AccessorType& accessor,
00254                         const unsigned attributeIndex)
00255         : mPointIndexTree(pointIndexTree)
00256         , mAccessor(accessor)
00257         , mAttributeIndex(attributeIndex) { }
00258 
00259     void operator()(const typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange& range) const {
00260 
00261         HoudiniAttributeType value;
00262 
00263         for (typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange::Iterator leaf=range.begin(); leaf; ++leaf) {
00264 
00265             // obtain the PointIndexLeafNode (using the origin of the current leaf)
00266 
00267             const PointIndexLeafNode* pointIndexLeaf = mPointIndexTree.probeConstLeaf(leaf->origin());
00268 
00269             if (!pointIndexLeaf)    continue;
00270 
00271             AttributeWriteHandle<HoudiniAttributeType>* attributeWriteHandle = leaf->template attributeWriteHandle<HoudiniAttributeType>(mAttributeIndex);
00272 
00273             Index64 index = 0;
00274 
00275             const IndexArray& indices = pointIndexLeaf->indices();
00276 
00277             for (typename IndexArray::const_iterator it = indices.begin(), it_end = indices.end(); it != it_end; ++it)
00278             {
00279                 mAccessor.getValue(*it, value);
00280 
00281                 attributeWriteHandle->set(index, value);
00282 
00283                 index++;
00284             }
00285         }
00286     }
00287 
00289 
00290     const PointIndexTreeType&   mPointIndexTree;
00291     const AccessorType          mAccessor;
00292     const unsigned              mAttributeIndex;
00293 };
00294 
00295 template<   typename PointDataTreeType,
00296             typename PointIndexTreeType,
00297             typename HoudiniAttributeType,
00298             typename AccessorType>
00299 struct PopulatePositionAttributeOp {
00300 
00301     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<PointDataTreeType> LeafManagerT;
00302     typedef typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange LeafRangeT;
00303 
00304     typedef typename PointIndexTreeType::LeafNodeType PointIndexLeafNode;
00305     typedef typename PointIndexLeafNode::IndexArray IndexArray;
00306 
00307     PopulatePositionAttributeOp(const PointIndexTreeType& pointIndexTree,
00308                                 const math::Transform& transform,
00309                                 const AccessorType& accessor,
00310                                 const unsigned attributeIndex)
00311         : mPointIndexTree(pointIndexTree)
00312         , mTransform(transform)
00313         , mAccessor(accessor)
00314         , mAttributeIndex(attributeIndex) { }
00315 
00316     void operator()(const typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange& range) const {
00317 
00318         HoudiniAttributeType positionWorldSpace;
00319 
00320         for (typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange::Iterator leaf=range.begin(); leaf; ++leaf) {
00321 
00322             // obtain the PointIndexLeafNode (using the origin of the current leaf)
00323 
00324             const PointIndexLeafNode* pointIndexLeaf = mPointIndexTree.probeConstLeaf(leaf->origin());
00325 
00326             if (!pointIndexLeaf)    continue;
00327 
00328             AttributeWriteHandle<Vec3f>* attributeWriteHandle = leaf->template attributeWriteHandle<Vec3f>(mAttributeIndex);
00329 
00330             Index64 index = 0;
00331 
00332             const IndexArray& indices = pointIndexLeaf->indices();
00333 
00334             for (typename IndexArray::const_iterator it = indices.begin(), it_end = indices.end(); it != it_end; ++it)
00335             {
00336                 mAccessor.getValue(*it, positionWorldSpace);
00337 
00338                 const HoudiniAttributeType positionIndexSpace = mTransform.worldToIndex(positionWorldSpace);
00339 
00340                 const HoudiniAttributeType positionVoxelSpace = HoudiniAttributeType(
00341                             positionIndexSpace.x() - math::Round(positionIndexSpace.x()),
00342                             positionIndexSpace.y() - math::Round(positionIndexSpace.y()),
00343                             positionIndexSpace.z() - math::Round(positionIndexSpace.z()));
00344 
00345                 attributeWriteHandle->set(index, positionVoxelSpace);
00346 
00347                 index++;
00348             }
00349         }
00350     }
00351 
00353 
00354     const PointIndexTreeType&   mPointIndexTree;
00355     const math::Transform&      mTransform;
00356     const AccessorType          mAccessor;
00357     const unsigned              mAttributeIndex;
00358 };
00359 
00360 template <typename PointAttributeT, typename AttributeT, typename PointDataTreeT, typename PointIndexTreeT>
00361 void populatePositionAttribute(PointDataTreeT& tree, const PointIndexTreeT& pointIndexTree, const math::Transform& xform, PointAttributeT& attribute, const unsigned index)
00362 {
00363     typedef typename PointAttributeT::template Accessor<AttributeT> AttributeAccessor;
00364 
00365     typename AttributeAccessor::Ptr accessor = attribute.template getAccessor<AttributeT>();
00366 
00367     PopulatePositionAttributeOp<PointDataTreeT,
00368                                 PointIndexTreeT,
00369                                 AttributeT,
00370                                 AttributeAccessor> populate(pointIndexTree,
00371                                                             xform,
00372                                                             *accessor,
00373                                                             index);
00374 
00375     typename tree::template LeafManager<PointDataTreeT> leafManager(tree);
00376     tbb::parallel_for(leafManager.leafRange(), populate);
00377 }
00378 
00379 template <typename PointAttributeT, typename AttributeT, typename PointDataTreeT, typename PointIndexTreeT>
00380 void populateAttribute(PointDataTreeT& tree, const PointIndexTreeT& pointIndexTree, PointAttributeT& attribute, const unsigned index)
00381 {
00382     typedef typename PointAttributeT::template Accessor<AttributeT> AttributeAccessor;
00383 
00384     typename AttributeAccessor::Ptr accessor = attribute.template getAccessor<AttributeT>();
00385 
00386     PopulateAttributeOp<PointDataTreeT,
00387                         PointIndexTreeT,
00388                         AttributeT,
00389                         AttributeAccessor> populate(pointIndexTree,
00390                                                     *accessor,
00391                                                     index);
00392 
00393     typename tree::template LeafManager<PointDataTreeT> leafManager(tree);
00394     tbb::parallel_for(leafManager.leafRange(), populate);
00395 }

00411 template<typename PointDataGridT, typename PointArrayT, typename PointIndexGridT>
00412 inline typename PointDataGridT::Ptr
00413 createPointDataGrid(const PointIndexGridT& pointIndexGrid,
00414     const PointArrayT& points, const math::Transform& xform)
00415 {
00416     typedef typename PointDataGridT::TreeType                       PointDataTreeT;
00417     typedef typename PointIndexGridT::TreeType                      PointIndexTreeT;
00418     typedef typename tree::template LeafManager<PointDataTreeT>     LeafManagerT;
00419     typedef typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange                        LeafRangeT;
00420     typedef typename PointArrayT::PointAttributeType                PointAttributeT;
00421     typedef typename PointArrayT::position_type                     PositionT;
00422     typedef typename PointArrayT::PositionAccessor                  PositionAccessorT;
00423 
00424     using point_data_grid_internal::InitialiseAttributesOp;
00425     using point_data_grid_internal::populateAttribute;
00426     using point_data_grid_internal::populatePositionAttribute;
00427 
00428     using math::Vec3;
00429 
00430     // construct the Tree using a topology copy of the PointIndexGrid
00431 
00432     const PointIndexTreeT& pointIndexTree(pointIndexGrid.tree());
00433     typename PointDataTreeT::Ptr treePtr(new PointDataTreeT(pointIndexTree));
00434 
00435     LeafManagerT leafManager = LeafManagerT(*treePtr);
00436     LeafRangeT leafRange = leafManager.leafRange();
00437 
00438     // create point attribute map
00439 
00440     AttributeSet::Descriptor::Ptr attributeDescriptor(points.attributeDescriptor());
00441 
00442     // create point attribute storage on each leaf
00443 
00444     InitialiseAttributesOp<PointDataTreeT, PointIndexTreeT, PointArrayT> initialise(
00445                                 *treePtr, pointIndexGrid.tree(), points, attributeDescriptor);
00446     tbb::parallel_for(leafRange, initialise);
00447 
00448     // populate attributes
00449 
00450     for (typename PointArrayT::const_iterator it = points.cbegin(), it_end = points.cend();
00451             it != it_end; ++it) {
00452 
00453         const Name& name = (*it)->name();
00454         const unsigned index = attributeDescriptor->find(name);
00455 
00456         const openvdb::tools::NamePair& attrType = (*it)->type();
00457 
00458         typename PointAttributeT::Ptr attribute = points.attribute(index);
00459 
00460         if (name == "P") {
00461             // "P" (i.e. position) attributes are constructed differently since
00462             // they can be stored in quantized values
00463 
00464             if (attrType.first == "vec3s") {
00465                 populatePositionAttribute<PointAttributeT, openvdb::Vec3f>(*treePtr, pointIndexTree, xform, *attribute, index);
00466             }
00467             else {
00468                 throw std::runtime_error("Unknown Position Attribute Type for Conversion: " + attrType.first);
00469             }
00470         }
00471         else {
00472 
00473             if (attrType.first == "bool") {
00474                 populateAttribute<PointAttributeT, bool>(*treePtr, pointIndexTree, *attribute, index);
00475             }
00476             else if (attrType.first == "int16") {
00477                 populateAttribute<PointAttributeT, short>(*treePtr, pointIndexTree, *attribute, index);
00478             }
00479             else if (attrType.first == "int32") {
00480                 populateAttribute<PointAttributeT, int>(*treePtr, pointIndexTree, *attribute, index);
00481             }
00482             else if (attrType.first == "int64") {
00483                 populateAttribute<PointAttributeT, long>(*treePtr, pointIndexTree, *attribute, index);
00484             }
00485             else if (attrType.first == "half") {
00486                 populateAttribute<PointAttributeT, half>(*treePtr, pointIndexTree, *attribute, index);
00487             }
00488             else if (attrType.first == "float") {
00489                 populateAttribute<PointAttributeT, float>(*treePtr, pointIndexTree, *attribute, index);
00490             }
00491             else if (attrType.first == "double") {
00492                 populateAttribute<PointAttributeT, double>(*treePtr, pointIndexTree, *attribute, index);
00493             }
00494             else if (attrType.first == "vec3h") {
00495                 populateAttribute<PointAttributeT, openvdb::math::Vec3<half> >(*treePtr, pointIndexTree, *attribute, index);
00496             }
00497             else if (attrType.first == "vec3s") {
00498                 populateAttribute<PointAttributeT, openvdb::math::Vec3<float> >(*treePtr, pointIndexTree, *attribute, index);
00499             }
00500             else if (attrType.first == "vec3d") {
00501                 populateAttribute<PointAttributeT, openvdb::math::Vec3<double> >(*treePtr, pointIndexTree, *attribute, index);
00502             }
00503             else {
00504                 throw std::runtime_error("Unknown Attribute Type for Conversion: " + attrType.first);
00505             }
00506         }
00507     }
00508 
00509     typename PointDataGridT::Ptr grid = PointDataGridT::create(treePtr);
00510     grid->setTransform(xform.copy());
00511     return grid;
00512 }
00513 
00514 template <typename PointDataGridT, typename PointArrayT>
00515 inline typename PointDataGridT::Ptr
00516 createPointDataGrid(const PointArrayT& points, const math::Transform& xform)
00517 {
00518     PointIndexGrid::Ptr pointGridPtr = createPointIndexGrid<PointIndexGrid>(points, xform);
00519     return createPointDataGrid<PointDataGridT>(*pointGridPtr, points, xform);
00520 }
